errors.pattern: Module not found|Can't resolve|Cannot find module
errors.cause: Module not installed, wrong path, or missing extension

solutions.code:
npm install missing-module
# Or
yarn add missing-module

// Files are case-sensitive on Linux
// import from './MyComponent' vs './mycomponent'

errors.pattern: You may need an appropriate loader|Module parse failed|Unexpected token
errors.message: No loader configured for file type
errors.cause: File type needs specific loader not configured

solutions.when: JSX or modern JS not transpiling

errors.message: Dynamic import chunk failed to load
errors.cause: Chunk not found at expected URL, CORS, or network issue

solutions.code:
# Server must return proper headers for chunks
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *

errors.pattern: JavaScript heap out of memory|FATAL ERROR.*heap|Allocation failed
errors.message: Node ran out of memory during build
errors.cause: Build too large for default Node memory limit

solutions.code:
# Set environment variable
export NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192"

# Or in npm script
"build": "node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js"

errors.cause: Module A imports B which imports A

errors.pattern: polyfill|Buffer is not defined|process is not defined|Can't resolve 'fs'
errors.cause: Webpack 5 removed Node polyfills, module expects them

errors.pattern: Plugin.*TypeError|Invalid configuration|Plugin could not be registered

solutions.code:
# Webpack 5 requires compatible plugins
npm ls html-webpack-plugin

# Upgrade if needed
npm install html-webpack-plugin@5

errors.message: Source map not working or error
errors.cause: Devtool misconfigured or source maps not served

solutions.code:
// For production (upload to error tracking, don't expose)
devtool: 'hidden-source-map'
